price: 4. Woh Yallay qululuk ken yoskomeeh, conxok amaan (saay) keenih yecee kinni.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
